column4: Hi, I have a quick question. I am trying to do a repair install of Windows XP. I started, but when my computer restarted, instead of continuing on to the Windows XP Install screen, it heads back to GRUB. Is there a way I can bypass GRUB so I can finish repairing Windows XP?
Doesn't seem like it....Unless you get something that will boot direct...E.G. a boot disc.
Honestly, I don't know that much about it, but GRUB installs itself on the MBR...so, unless you bypass it somehow it seems you'll be hitting it
